tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** ** *** ****** ** *** ****** Unlike all other doctors whom we consulted for our new born baby, she was more inclined towards natural healing and emphasized more on infant's comfort. She doesn't prescribe blood tests or any other tests for that matter unnecessarily. She is experienced enough to be able to gauge baby's needs without pulling out blood. 

She is also a very friendly doctor, takes out time and explains everything in detail. She doesn't believe in frequent hospital visits especially for infants. She is one of the few doctors who is very prompt on responding to calls or WhatsApp messages. 

Overall, we are very happy that we switched to her and we recommend her - 100%! 

The best part about her again - She is more inclined to natural healing and natural growth than medicines, which is found rarely in doctors these days especially in a money minting industry like hospitals!!

Doctor Madhavi is an excellent lady and with wonderful human and personel touch towards her patients.she is available even during mid nights on phone to assist her patients. She provides her patients with all possible details required and best medicines possible. She also doesn't recommend antibiotics until it is really needed and waits to heal with out antibiotics. Really wonderful doctor and I am absolutely happy having her my kids paediatrician

Madhavi doctor is very friendly and she take care of child as her own child. She always keep track of baby growth and always advice us with best practices to handle baby. During any emergency she will be always available either in mobile or personal and help us.

Visited doctor for our 6 months baby who had a bad cold and cough. First of all, I don’t understand the concept of not having a sitting place in the paediatrician room, really not sure on the rationale. We have not found the doctor to be affectionate and thorough. Even after taking the medicine, our baby cough increased a lot and she got an ear infection. As a first time parent, we normally have lots of questions and to my surprise our questions were answered with only bare minimum details and we felt doctor did not had time. No check was done to know the history of the baby as we were visiting for the first time.

My baby got fever so we went to the hospital by seeing the reviews but once I entered I realised waste of time .
Baby is crying she is simply telling take the baby out it’s getting disturbance and not even listening the problems I don’t know y given that much reviews I’m not at all satisfied

They charged a registration fee as hospital charges worth Rs.400, which they forced us to pay. It is not mentioned on Practo. This is unprofessional behaviour. Neither will I visit the doctors again nor Birthplace hospital for anything in the future.
Doctor is not at all friendly, being as a pediatrician she should have engaged with child, even after baby said bye she haven’t reposnded back to her

Charging  more  and not giving any reason  for extra charge,  totally  unfair. 

If any such pls me mention while  booking.
She has attention to detail .listens to problems clearly.explains things with patience.would definitely recommend doctor madhavi to my friends and family
********* * **** ******* Very good experience with Dr.Madhavi. Birthplace gachibowli clinic is very convenient *** ******** **** ****** ** **** *******

Doctor is very patient, listens  to all queries and clarifies them clearly. She normally avoids too many medications for small problems. I recommend her to any parent wants to take care of their child.

Very good. My son is very fond of Dr. Madhavi. She is very nice and always approachable. 
Polite, friendly,diagnosis explained. ********* ** **********
Very good. Doctor is always available to suggest on health issues. Always reliable and suggests ******* medication. Does not suggest unnecessary medicines
Amazing experience. Doctor is very friendly * ********* ************** She knows babies pretty well. New age, modern doctor who goes strictly by science & research.
Good experience with Dr.madhavi mam,I I'm satisfied with her,I will definitely suggest her to my family n friends. Very responsive
She was very friendly and addresses all over concerns in every visit.  She is available for any emergency suggestions. She created trust on her.

Excellent doctor with great experience. She understands baby so well that our questions are answered before we ask them... She has taking care of our daughter right from birth, we never faced any issue till date.
Dr madhavi is an excellent doc. She puts new mother's at ease and makes them comfortable which makes the consultation experience good.

Everything is excellent here in BP.
Dr Madhavi is very good and caring doctor.
She is doing her job 110%.
:-) :-)......
Very satisfying. Dr. Madhavi is an excellent pediatrician, very patient and helpful in answering all our questions and concerns. Very happy to have her take care of my daughter.
Dr.Madhavi has been my daughters pediatrician since she was born.A very friendly,cordial and nice doctor
Dr Madhavi is always very helpful and recommends what's best in baby's interest. Birthplace gachibowli is very convenient and provides easy access to best doctors.

review: Excellent. She is very friendly  and satisfied with the treatment ,We went late in the night still doctor was available.
Madam is so polite and friendly that patient would feel 50% cure even before treatment starts, she doesn't like unnecessary visit

review: Pleasent Experience, Doctor has good experience. Will recommend this doctor for others. But name confusion is there for the hospital  in practo NU born clinic , but the name displayed is The Birth Place ,Practo team please check and update on this

It was nice. The way she treat with us is nice. Way of approach and talking with us is good.
********* ** *****
Dr.madhavi has been very patient and have always been very understanding.
Very responsive.Answers call and a lot of help immediately through msg.Good Doctor
highly recommended doc. Dr is very friendly and approachable.
Very good doctor.takes personal attention.my kid loves her
